meanings.definition: Cauterises (verb): burn the skin or flesh of (a wound) with a heated instrument or caustic substance to stop bleeding or prevent infection.
meanings.sent1: The doctor cauterises the wound to stop the bleeding.
meanings.sent2: She cauterises the wound carefully to prevent infection.
meanings.sent3: The firefighter cauterises the wound on the building to stop the 'bleeding' of flames.
meanings.sent4: His words cauterises her heart like a searing iron.
meanings.sent5: The image of cauterising the wound stayed vividly in her mind.
